name: Arzule
long_description: Arzule is a partnership intelligence platform for B2B SaaS teams. It continuously monitors the SaaS ecosystem for new features, integrations, and product changes, and uses AI agents to identify strategic partnership opportunities as they emerge, such as integration, distribution, technology, or ecosystem partnerships. Arzule is personalized to each companyâ€™s product, positioning, and roadmap, so searches are always run with your business in mind. Instead of static lists or manual research, Arzule builds deep, living profiles of companies and explains which partnerships matter, why they make sense now, and what strategic leverage they unlock. The result is faster, higher-quality partnership decisions without missed opportunities or repetitive research.
one_liner: AI agents for strategic partnership research
